The user creates four [[shadow clones]] and, alongside them, launch a different base-[[Nature Transformation|elemental]] attack at the target simultaneously.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the manga and anime, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]''.
** In the game, before the elemental attacks are fired, Hiruzen disguises the four shadow clones as fūma shuriken, reverting them back to shadow clones after throwing them at the opponent.
